name: Add a new row in Google Sheets for a new idea in ProdPad
description: Every time a new idea is created in ProdPad, Make will automatically add that idea's info to a new row in your Google Sheets. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aiOgVm-KqBbA0ugfQ4tY_csSZIOj7qdJj-3I9fL8DKM/edit#gid=0).
